feature_summary: ユーザーからの問い合わせリンク (User Feedback Links)
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: FeedbackSection UI component renders 4 feedback links (Bug Report, Feature Request, Question, View Issues) in InfoModal and MobileInfoContent
AC-2: All feedback links point to correct GitHub template URLs defined in src/config/github-links.ts
AC-3: All links have rel='noopener noreferrer' and target='_blank' for security
AC-4: commandmate issue create supports --bug/--feature/--question flags with correct gh CLI template name mapping
AC-5: commandmate issue create validates title (max 256 chars) and body (max 65536 chars)
AC-6: commandmate issue create sanitizes labels (strips control characters, zero-width characters)
AC-7: commandmate issue search passes query to gh issue list --search
AC-8: commandmate issue list calls gh issue list
AC-9: commandmate docs --section shows documentation section content
AC-10: commandmate docs --search performs case-insensitive search across sections
AC-11: commandmate docs --all lists all available sections
AC-12: commandmate docs rejects path traversal attempts
AC-13: commandmate docs --search rejects queries exceeding 256 characters (SEC-SF-002)
AC-14: gh CLI is registered as optional dependency in cli-dependencies.ts
AC-15: issue/docs commands exit with DEPENDENCY_ERROR (1) when gh CLI is not installed
AC-16: GitHub URLs are centralized in src/config/github-links.ts (DRY principle)
AC-17: commandmate init displays AI tool integration guide after success
AC-18: i18n keys exist for en and ja locales (feedback.title, feedback.bugReport, feedback.featureRequest, feedback.question, feedback.viewIssues)
test_scenarios: Scenario 1: Verify FeedbackSection renders correctly with all 4 links and correct URLs
Scenario 2: Verify issue create command template mapping (--bug -> Bug Report, --feature -> Feature Request, --question -> Question)
Scenario 3: Verify input validation rejects oversized title/body and sanitizes labels
Scenario 4: Verify docs command retrieves sections, searches, and prevents path traversal
Scenario 5: Verify gh CLI dependency check and graceful degradation
Scenario 6: Verify GitHub URL constants are consistent and correctly derived from base URL
Scenario 7: Verify existing tests (version-checker, init, cli-dependencies) remain passing
